entry.title: Open Access Archaeological Reports: Tel Kabri
entry.content:
[First posted in AWOL 10 August 2009. Updated 3 September 2013]

Preliminary reports on the results of excavations at Tel Kabri in Israel have been published on line immediately following the end of each field season since 2005:

  • 2005 - Yasur-Landau, Assaf; Cline, Eric H. First announcement concerning the results of the 2005 exploratory season at Tel Kabri
  • 2006 - Cline, Eric H.; Yasur-Landau, Assaf. Results of the 2006 Season Kabri Regional Archaeological Survey Project
  • 2007 - Yasur-Landau, Assaf; Cline, Eric H. Results of the 2007 Season Kabri Archaeological Project (KAP)
  • 2008 - Yasur-Landau, Assaf; Cline, Eric H. Preliminary Report on the Results of the 2008 Excavation Season at Tel Kabri
  • 2009 - Yasur-Landau, Assaf; Cline, Eric H. Preliminary Report on the Results of the 2009 Excavation Season at Tel Kabri
  • 2011 - Yasur-Landau, Assaf; Cline, Eric H. Preliminary report on the results of the 2011 excavation season at Tel Kabri
  • 2013 - Yasur-Landau, Assaf; Eric H. Cline, Andrew Koh, Nurith Goshen, Alexandra Ratzlaff, and Inbal Samet  Preliminary report on the results of the 2013 excavation season at Tel Kabri
In addition, during the field season, immediate reports on the progress of excavations are presented at the Dig Kabri blog (2009), Dig Kabri 2011, and Dig Tel Kabri 2013. 

The news feeds from this and other excavation blogs are aggregated at Taygete Atlantis: Excavation Blogs, one of the components of Atlantides: Feed Aggregators for Ancient Studies.
